availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew Jackson Oldham (Jefferson County, Kentucky, brick mason. )

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, brick mason. Kentucky native. Married to Rachel Groves Brock Oldham in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on April 27, 1841. Father of William B. Oldham, George Oldham, James H. Oldham, Joseph A. Oldham, Joseph A. Oldham, Charles Parsons Oldham, Celia Belle Oldham Lavely, and Abraham Oldham. Brick mason in Jefferson County in 1850. Brick mason in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
